title: "You're so weak that you heal the enemy!"
body:
So there's a saying some, or no one says when someone is doing no damage. Well it came true when our lucian started to attack galio and his shield was literally making lucian's attacks heal him.

So I guess you can be so weak that your attacks heal the enemy lol.

replies.body: If you picked Galio in URF, you could literally heal from the enemy tower's damage in the late game.

Brilliant :P
At first I thought this was the result of a taunt from a sassy teammate but this is so much better.
